summary: I BOUGHT THE CAR AND HAD GREAT MILEAGE FOR ABOUT 4 MONTHS.  NOW I GET LESS THAN SOMEONE WHO OWNS A CHEVY CAMERO THAT IS 3 YEARS OLDER THAN MY CAR.  I WENT ON A TRIP TO SOUTHERN ILLINOIS AND 5 AND 1/2 HOUR DRIVE.  I USED ALL THE OIL IN MY CAR.  I TOOK IT TO A DEALER AND WAS TOLD THAT I HAD BLOWN A HEAD GASKET.  *JB
